entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Blind River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. High zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
